#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ld long double
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int i;
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		int n=s.length();
		long long int sum=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]<='9'&&s[i]>='0')
			{
				sum+=(s[i]-'0');
			}
		}
		cout << sum << "\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
